steps.title: Find Similar Fish
steps.description: Look for fish of the same type and level to merge together. Similar fish will have matching colors and patterns.

steps.title: Drag and Drop
steps.description: Drag one fish onto another similar fish to start the merge process. The fish will glow when they're compatible.

steps.title: Watch Evolution
steps.description: See your fish evolve into a more powerful and valuable species! Each merge creates a unique combination.

steps.title: Build Your School
steps.description: Continue merging to build the largest and most diverse fish school in the ocean. Bigger schools earn more rewards.

steps.title: Discover Rare Species
steps.description: Special combinations unlock rare and exotic fish that can't be found anywhere else in the ocean.

steps.title: Upgrade Your Reef
steps.description: Use your earnings to upgrade your coral reef, expand your territory, and unlock new merge possibilities.
